level.text: A retired judge seeking a favorable recommendation for appointment or reappointment to a term as a senior judge shall be evaluated by the Commission through a review of the judge’s physical and mental fitness and his or her ability to perform judicial duties.
The recommendation standards are as follows:
Favorable – The judge is physically and mentally fit and able satisfactorily to perform judicial duties.
Unfavorable – The judge is unfit for further judicial service.
